name.baseName: 底泥修复;原位覆盖;覆盖;活性炭覆盖

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Use of capping vessel to cap the AC on the sediment.
使用疏浚船完成覆盖材料的覆盖。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: There is no clear start time for data collection in the literature, and the start time of the validity period is based on the publication time of the literature
文献中没有明确数据收集的开始时间，以文献发表时间为有效期的开始时间

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: After investigation, no relevant domestic research literature has been found yet.
经查询，暂未找到国内有相关研究文献

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: capping material was used of 2 kg /m2. Density is 0.5 tonnes / m3.
覆盖材料的使用量为2 kg /m2，密度为0.5 吨/m3。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This process pertains to the technique of sediment remediation involving in-situ mulching, specifically with a focus on activated carbon mulching. This method is typically employed in the environmental engineering and remediation sector to cap and contain contaminated sediments at the bottom of water bodies to reduce pollution dispersion. The capping material's primary application here is to stabilize the contaminated sediments, preventing further spread of contaminants and enabling eco-restoration projects.
该工艺属于原位底泥修复技术，特指活性炭覆盖技术。该方法通常用于环境工程和修复行业，目的是通过在水体底部污染沉积物上覆盖材料，以减少污染物扩散。覆盖材料的主要应用是稳定污染沉积物，防止污染物进一步扩散，为生态修复项目创造条件。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: . The life cycle inventories, i.e. the aggregated environmental data collected for the modeled system, are derived from three sources. The main source used for the majority of processes is the Ecoinvent 2.2 database.
Process inventory data是根据ISO 14040关于LCA.35的规定获得的。基本数据来自特定场地的盆栽实验、中试和供应商处获取，这些数据代表了中国南方的情况。二级数据来自Ecoinvent数据库v2.3，从中选择了地理来源和技术因素最相似的过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sparrevik, M. et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 45, 4235–4241 (2011).
Sparrevik, M. et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 45, 4235–4241 (2011).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for life cycle assessment, it is imperative to align the geographic and technical contexts of the model with those represented in the dataset. Users should ensure that process conditions such as climate, sediment type, and pollution levels are analogous to those in the data, which reflects conditions in Southern China. The start time of the dataset validity should be considered as the literature's publication time. If the dataset is used beyond this context, limitations should be acknowledged. The given density and use rate of the capping material must be accurately factored into calculations to avoid data inaccuracies. Additionally, updates from more recent versions of the Ecoinvent database should be considered for improved precision.
当使用该数据集进行生命周期评估时，重要的是确保模型的地理和技术背景与数据集所代表的一致。用户应确保模型中的过程条件，如气候、沉积物类型和污染水平，与数据中反映的南中国条件相似。数据集有效期的开始时间应当以文献发表时间为准。如果数据集在此背景之外使用，应承认其局限性。覆盖材料的密度和使用量必须准确计入计算以避免数据不准确。此外，应考虑使用Ecoinvent数据库更新的数据，以提高精度。

completeness.common:other: All maior raw materials and all the essentialenergy is ncuded.
输入输出流包括所有主要原材料和所有必要的能源消耗

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 这里指的是采用活性炭覆盖的底泥沉积物影响区域，用面积表示
